about_the_game:
---- Demo Version ----

Immerse yourself in the intense atmosphere of this survival psychological horror.

Experience all aspects of the core gameplay but progress is limited to this demo section—advanced levels await in the full game. Add to your Wishlist for updates on the final release.

Story

It’s Friday night, and you’re feeling numb and bored. Life feels like an endless cycle of frustration and regret, with doubts about your choices weighing heavily on your mind. Searching for either confrontation or escape, you turn to your hidden stash of forbidden substances.

What starts as a search for relief quickly spirals into a psychedelic nightmare. Your fragile mindset transforms the trip into a chaotic maze of fears and self-doubt, forcing you to navigate surreal landscapes while confronting the darkest corners of your mind.

Immersive Experience

  • Explore ever-changing environments that mirror the chaos of a bad trip.

  • From shadowy forests to claustrophobic corridors, each setting feels unsettling and unpredictable.

  • Disturbing soundscapes and atmospheric visuals create a tense, immersive journey.

Gameplay

  • An intense first-person horror experience where you must run and search for an escape while staying ahead of your relentless inner demons.

  • Navigate through interconnected environments, each revealing new fears and challenges.

Will you find an escape, or will your psyche consume you in the maze?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Ryzen™ 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A survival psychological horror game set in a psychedelic nightmare where you navigate the twisted maze of your disturbed mind, while trying to escape your relentless inner demons. Each turn warps reality as fear and paranoia take hold. Can you escape before losing your sanity?
